name: Ambulance frenzy
description:
Try to be the fastest ambulance driver! 🚑

Made for the game jam Trijam 90. 

Everything was made within 3h and 5-7min. Didn't keep exactly track of how much I went over, but I only added Restart and removed a debug function that would have allowed you to cheat. 🙂

Sfx by: SirTimmyTeabuck

Controls:

W/S or Up/Down - Drive forward and reverse.

R - Restart. 

(Left click also does Restart, was accidentally left there.)
